website_summaries.verdict: You can’t beat the money-saving value of buying a rainbow of 36 uniquely colored Play-Doh tubs at once, and they’re great for sculpting with family and friends.
pros: No two colors are repeated in the set
cons: Each tub is approximately two-thirds the size of a full tub

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Staple
customer_reviews.text: Great value at $16. Months of fun for a small investment. My 2.5 year old loves his play-doh (and mom is a big fan too). Cans are not full sized but approximately 2/3 the size of a regular can. I will attempt to attach photos so that you can see the comparisons of both the containers and contents.
customer_reviews.author: Dionne B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a party
customer_reviews.text: Bought a large quantity of playdoh for a rainbow playdoh party my daughter loved it !! Got all the colors and all the kids loved it colors were mixed but everyone had a great time. If you need playdoh all the colors this is your box
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Severely damaged containers
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 36 pack for my son's kindergarten class. A quarter of them (9) were severely smashed. The playdoh was still ok, just hard to get out, but I was embarrassed.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene C.

customer_reviews.title: A hit as a Halloween hand-out!
customer_reviews.text: I handed these out to younger kids for Halloween and they were a hit. One boy said, "My Dad hates Play-Doh so this is great!" I saw that there was a Halloween-themed assortment of smaller containers, but this one is the better value (and more interesting, I thought.) I didn't get through all of them (we don't get a lot of kids trick-or-treating), so I have some for next year.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lionel

customer_reviews.title: wide variety of colors!
customer_reviews.text: Such a variety of color! I buy in bulk allot and I am used to getting a box with allot of the same colors and a few other colors thrown in. I was happily surprised to find that there were no two colors alike! I purchased 2 cases for Angel Tree gift bags and I will deffinately purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Don and Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my girlfriend who is 34 years old. She loved this more than any gift I got her. The amount of colors was very impressive and she really likes them. The box contained very fresh plastic cans of the product like it was made yesterday, the lids were very tight and she really loves the brand new Play Doh smell...LOL. If you want to see what neat colors they have come up with, I recommend this set....I never knew there was black Play Doh...lol
customer_reviews.author: Jason Brindamour

customer_reviews.title: TONS OF DUPLICATES
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. Tons of duplicates. I got 4 yellows, 3 pinks, and multiple doubles.. see attached photo. I got this for a variety of colors .. not to give my son a bunch of feminine colors. How can a child even be creative with the same color... Guess he's really going to have to use his imagination huh. No white, black, red, or green, primary blue.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: NOT 3 ounces
customer_reviews.text: Received the play doh on time, but when I opened the containers, they were definitely NOT 3 ounces. Several had less than 1 ounce, Two containers were empty, and the rest of them had less than 2 ounces. Not one of the them had 3 ounces. Also, like other reviewers, I had multiples of the same color. Very disappointed and returned them
customer_reviews.author: BEWARE of SCAMS

customer_reviews.title: DUPLICATES!
customer_reviews.text: Too many duplicates!! Out of 36 cans I think theres 26 actual colors in my order. Not what I was expecting at all. If purchased at Walmart you would get a 20 pack of all DIFFERENT colors. Good thing I had a gift card I got so didnt pay full price. An its just playdoh so between my kids I am sure it will be ruined and left out pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: MoMof3

customer_reviews.title: This is not real play-Doh. it is thin, ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not real play-Doh. it is thin, not right colors and sticks to everything. Was nothing but a big nightmare and mess. Hard to clean up
customer_reviews.author: Paula Jerome-Hoover

customer_reviews.title: NOT 36 different colors!
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and saw it had mostly duplicates. even 3 of some colors. Only about 20 distinct colors. This is the second time I ordered this product and the first time it did have 36 distinct colors. Someone either messed up or didn't care.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: The Playdoh is all dry
customer_reviews.text: I order this for my daughter, because she loves to play with Playdoh, and this is the second time that I ordered it. Only this time the Playdoh is all dry out and the returning window has closed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: So bad
customer_reviews.text: Horrible consistency. I don’t think it was even real play doh. Too sticky
customer_reviews.author: olivia wyles

customer_reviews.title: One star
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast but when we opened all the play doh was the same color...containers have different color tops but all the contents are one color
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weird Sticky Consistancy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my kids birthday party favors and the colors were awesome and a big hit! However, the Play Doh itself in each canister was sticky! It didn’t feel like normal Play Doh and stuck to my kids hands and any surface we played with it on. So disappointing because we didn’t realize the weird consistency of the Doh until we handed it out to all of the kids at the party!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lipman

customer_reviews.title: Good Ol' Play- Doh
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just kids nowadays, but when I gifted this to my nephews and they didn't really play with it.. Rather just mashed all the colors and left it to dry.. Some of the colors seemed repetitive and there were a lot of "girly" colors like pink and lighter pastel colors which I set aside.. I thought I would just have them and if kids came around I could set those out.. I ended up playing with them and the smell of play-doh just brought back memories.. These containers are not the original big jar, about 2/3 of the original jar..
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps children occupied
customer_reviews.text: My special needs child loves the texture and sensory perception of Play Doh, and creates "art" with these on a daily basis. Amazon's price for this large box set is incredible. Instead of risking boredom by buying one color in bulk, I buy this box of Doh every few months. My child gets to pick the color he wants on a particular day or session, takes it out, plays with it, tidies up any remaining material and is ready to play the next time.
customer_reviews.author: Kundan Sen

customer_reviews.title: Dim night light
customer_reviews.text: Based on the description and reviews, it seemed like a good possibility for use in my office closet, which has no light. I even asked how many lumens or watt equivalents the light was, and the responses was that it was sufficiently bright. It is not. It would make a great night light for lighting your way dimly in the dark, but it is definitely not for use in closets or anywhere else you actually need to see to find something. I would rate the wattage equivalent to a 25 watt bulb.
customer_reviews.author: ESB

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I will be using this for anatomy projects due throughout the quarter. Only came with one white and one black, unfortunately, and arrived late for last project of previous quarter so had to scramble to come up with something else at the last minute. As long as I cook the play-doh for an extended period of time (more than an hour at 275, then had to leave in oven overnight), it seems to harden just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dana R

customer_reviews.title: Useless amount of pink
customer_reviews.text: As far as play doh goes, it is what it says on the box. I needed to order this for my sons diorama. This was the only size that had more earthly looking tones. But for every earthly tone I was stuck with 4 pinks, fluorescent oranges and bright oranges. It would have been nice to have an option with just the greens, blues, greys, browns and blacks. As opposed to being stuck with 24 other useless pots and the hopes that his next diorama is a Barbie dream house.
customer_reviews.author: elly

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment of colors.
customer_reviews.text: I've seen a lot of complaints about the size, but the containers are larger than the containers that are usually included in the Play-Doh sets, so if you're buying it for personal use, & not for mass distribution like for a classroom, etc., then you shouldn't be disappointed. The only thing I found odd was that the containers don't have the plastic seal on them, usually found on single containers, & they don't come in Play-Doh packaging, they are just in the shipping box. They weren't used, or dried out, so I guess it's not an issue, just struck me as odd.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: A donation to Kindergarten
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a donation for my daughter's kindergarten class. They arrived in excellent condition with a wide variety of colors. The only very minor downside is there are slightly smaller than the product I purchased at a local store. To me this wasn't worth removing a star because the seller has kept the price low which I appreciate alot! Under $1 per container is the only way to be able to afford to donate this and I could happier that I did. Her teacher made sure to give me a personal thank you for it and that made my day! Excellent product with the quality we all expect at the price I can afford to pay.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Duplicates! Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this set was going to rock - with 36 colors - how could being stuck in the house be boring? I held out and waited to open it. When I did, I was shocked. Duplicates. Duplicates. Duplicates. And the colors? Ugh. I wasn’t impressed. All of this after I pulled three jars out and started creating with my toddler. No refunds! Not impressed. But it’s Playdoh and it’s still fun...so if I’m stuck with it...
customer_reviews.author: Lolly Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great value for usage and playtime
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so inexpensive for the amount of joy it brings my son. All for the price of a movie he creates and destroys endless world of fun. He has an activity table that we have dubbed the play doh table and he spends hours on end with us creating anything his mind tells him. When it dries out we just buy more because it is so cheap. Turn off the tv and give your little engineer time to shine.
customer_reviews.author: crash2311

customer_reviews.title: Check them because mine were dry
customer_reviews.text: Does play doh expire? Because the day I received them, most of them were all hard and others seemed dry. I still opened them and let my kids play with them because they are 2 & 3 years old and don’t know the difference. But they’re all in the trash now. Didn’t last very long. I wonder if it was a packaging problem or what.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: Best Way To Buy Play-Doh
customer_reviews.text: My kids burn through their arts and craft stuff, and Play-Doh is no exception. I love this bulk buy. The containers are a great medium size, not the tiny ones that are like stocking stuffer's. This is the third time reordering this set, and all three times there we a good assortment of colors. All of the containers were fresh, none of them were stale or hard by the time we got to use them.
customer_reviews.author: spinaz

customer_reviews.title: Play Doh fun for a long time
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking at this set of Play Doh for my grandson for Christmas but didn't really want to spend $25 on it as I had already bought him so many other gifts. When I looked at it again and it was marked down to $15 I bought it immediately. He was just thrilled to have so many different colors of Play Doh and we've played with it for hours and hours and still haven't even opened half of the containers. He loves Play Doh and I do too.
customer_reviews.author: Pam W

customer_reviews.title: Great & affordable but there’s just 2 little problems....
customer_reviews.text: Great and affordable Play-Dog package!! Especially nowadays when we have kids at home all day! This is a great way to keep them entertained! BUT there was 2 little problems! My daughter did a whole unboxing video on this package on YouTube. Her YouTube name is: PreciousValeria or just search UNBOXING 36 PLAY-DOH! (AMAZON EXCLUSIVE!) For full review.
customer_reviews.author: Damary Bustos

customer_reviews.title: Repeat colors. Over and over again!
customer_reviews.text: I got 10, yes you read that correctly, 10...duplicate colors! What a waste of my money! Had I known I was paying for the same colors and not the variety advertised, I would have picked another product with just 16 colors at a much cheaper price. Don’t waste your money. Huge letdown.
customer_reviews.author: roda

customer_reviews.title: Quite a few duplicates, but worked for party favors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as birthday treats for my 5yo’s class, with the intention of giving two to each student with some shape cutters (no food treats allowed at her school). It worked out fine because I was able to move the duplicates around, but I was expecting way less duplicated colors after reading the reviews. They were packaged well and seem to be “fresh,” so it’s a good value if you don’t mind what you get for colors.
customer_reviews.author: MayBae

customer_reviews.title: Great value, Items as described & on time
customer_reviews.text: PlayDoh brand is the top quality brand and this seller gives the top quality product along with super competitive pricing. These items are all being donated to a charitable cause in shoeboxes (along with many other personal need items, school supplies and toys) that are delivered all around the world. Super important to this Prime buyer/giver that orders arrive on time as promised by sellers. This seller and Amazon made that happen, so very grateful...as will be the recipients around the world who have...virtually...nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Plucky

customer_reviews.title: False advertising-2 oz NOT 3oz
customer_reviews.text: Play doh is fine but the amount is inaccurate. I am not the first one to report this yet it is still listed inaccurate.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Dolberg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the kids
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased four of these boxes within the last two years or so and I really enjoy the product. We use it with the kids we work with when conducting forensic interviews. It helps keep them focused through the interview and it's something to do with their hands. It's the perfect size to give to every kid that comes through our door and they are able to take it home. I have never had any issues with anything I have received.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Medium sized containers, multiple of each color
customer_reviews.text: Items came as expected! They were packed and shipped nicely stacked as pictured. They are the medium sized containers (not the real small ones and not the larger ones) but still enough play doh - especially considering that there are multiples of each color. My three year old mixes them all anyways so this was a great value for play doh she plays with for a week and then gets tossed for new colors!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Q

customer_reviews.title: Too many duplicate colors
customer_reviews.text: This product is not as shown. Of the 36 containers of play doh, 12 of the colors are duplicates and received 4 of the same orange. There is no red play doh. I am very disappointed in this purchase and will not purchase from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: It’s fraud.. some duplicate. Not actual play dough
customer_reviews.text: Fraud! Beware! This is not real Play Dough. It’s some duplicate. What non sense is going on in name of play dough. It is so so thin and sticks to everything. Was nothing but a big nightmare and mess. Because of corona situation we are not stepping out. Don’t know how we will return
customer_reviews.author: S Sharma

customer_reviews.title: YES!  This is a fantastic Play-Doh collection.  So glad we got it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This set of play doh is a game changer. There are so many colors, and the "doh" is the freshest I've ever encountered. The size is decent (see pic - that's top layer in the box) and my 2yo and 3yo can't get enough of playing with this. It's a constant ever since we got this collection, whereas they weren't super crazy about it before. Sure they liked it, but now it's a constant request! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Night Owl

customer_reviews.title: Ify at first but it turned out great
customer_reviews.text: So I read many of the reviews and I wasn’t sure wether it was the right choice to buy, but when I received my package I was presently surprise. All the play dough was there, the size is perfect for longer fun time and bigger size projects. My toddler loves it!! We did get a few repeated colors but it’s for the kid so it worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Lioness

customer_reviews.title: duplicate colors
customer_reviews.text: The photo and description of this product online seems to imply that there will be 36 different colors in the selection. It looks more like multiples of just a few colors. The description needs to be made clear. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Strickland

customer_reviews.title: A ton of fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I bought them as a fun throwback for my two adult sisters and I. Although it has been decades since we last played with Play-Doh, we didn't miss a beat and had a ball! They were very very soft and not dried out at all, and the colors are phenomenal! So fun to be a kid again, even for a little while!
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars vis-a-vis other play doh
customer_reviews.text: Child loves the color selection, when it's on sale it's a great deal, always have a few jars in reserve as the ones put in play either a) dry out or b) turn the uniform grey/brown of all mixed play doh colors. The colors are vivid and fun, if you don't want to deal with replacing it I'd recommend just staying with the orange play doh of our youth, otherwise, this set is the way to go (on sale.)
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I have bought different ones before from Amazon and had accidently ordered really tiny ones. THESE ones are perfect. Exactly what I was looking for. Regular size you expect, TONs of colors, and nothing was dried out. I am a very happy customer! I'll be buying again (because my daughter loves mixing colors and keeping them in the shape until they dry) and would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: It's Playdoh...
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 3.5 stars. I am kind of disappointed. I know it says assorted BUT my box came with soooo many duplicates. I got 4 of one color (a light orangey color), 3 of another (a dark orange), and 2 each of 7 other colors...and they aren't the most used colors. That accounts for 21 of the playdohs. These are smaller than the average can also. Definitely not what I expected based on the image displayed for the item.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Not a nice gift
customer_reviews.text: This was for a present (for my goddaughter), and she was still siked about it, but I was kinda pissed because there weren’t all diverse colors in the set. There were many repeats, but my friend just didn’t want to send it back because it was too much of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: BBRITT

customer_reviews.title: Great value for variety
customer_reviews.text: I have no complain, these pack of 36 play-dog’s is great the colors are beautiful and vibrant! The only some may wonder is if colors repeat in this set and yes only a few colors do but the majority are all different colors and these 3oz. Size is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: My kids go nuts for this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I mean come in it’s Play doh. This was great because I have two kids. Little kids who aren’t the best T putting it away right. So I give them one each at a time so this is lasting forever. They love having different color choices. I love their joy from it. And it has the same old childhood smell
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat this value!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a kid who loves to model and craft with Play Doh, you wont find a better deal than this. It is a much better value than buying them at the stores in smaller quantities. Packaging only got 4/5 stars because they just come in a plain cardboad box - but we dont mind. They enjoy using the box too lol
customer_reviews.author: Mother of Wildlings

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of colors!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I wanted and needed! I was running low on play-doh and I needed enough to last awhile, but also to not care as much about when my kids mix them together! If we need or want a solid color, chances are I have it in my stash ;) Great quality, great price for the amount, very happy and well-stocked!
customer_reviews.author: anew10

customer_reviews.title: The perfect toy
customer_reviews.text: This Play Doh Mega Pack kept my daughter (7) and my niece (4) occupied for days! That's a pretty hard feat, since they usually jump from one toy to the next (leaving a huge mess behind, of course). As an even bigger bonus, there are so many different colors and cans with this set that they don't argue over who get to use which color. They've made pretend cookies, people, pets, houses, all sorts of things, without running out of Play Doh. This is one of my best toy purchases ever, and I highly recommend this set for anyone who has kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price in bulk!
customer_reviews.text: I buy play doh in bulk to have in long meetings with my work team. It is raved about during the meetings and helps give folks something to do if they need to fidget
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Quiet 3 Year Old
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves play doh. He can sit quietly at the table for 15, 30, maybe even 45 minutes rolling out dough and making “cookies” and dinosaurs and trucks. 36 containers in every color he can imagine - that kind of peace is priceless. These come in a box, and when you open it you can practically hear the choir singing the song of the SAHM that just wants to drink her coffee while it’s still warm. He reaches in, picks a color, and we both are happy. Priceless I tell ya. You should try it.
customer_reviews.author: Carla TheBubblelush

customer_reviews.title: A boat load of colors that are sure to delight your children (or kids at heart)!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I wanted! I bought it as a trip down nostalgia valley but I play with them every few days now. The color selection is bright and looks extra pretty when you arrange all the tubs in a rainbow fashion. They are smaller than standard playdoh cups but there are duplicates of certain colors. The only complaint I have is that I wish they gave an extra white since it tends to get visibly dirty pretty quickly. Happy playing!
customer_reviews.author: Yum Yum

customer_reviews.title: Sensibly used, this quantity could last awhile...making it very worthy for the value.
customer_reviews.text: This was gifted to my 5 yr old grandson...he loves Play-doh... it allows him to be as creative & colorful as his imagination will allow....which is very extensive. He spends hours w/Play-doh but his (very sensible) mom only gives him a few colors at a time.
customer_reviews.author: "JJ"

customer_reviews.title: Great for Student Gifts
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as a class gift for my students. There are a variety of different bright colors. I was worried that since it was a 36 pack, I would get a lot of white, brown, tan, etc. However the assortment has a lot of shades of pink, blue, green, etc so it was perfect for my students. The cans are slightly smaller but I knew this based on previous reviews and the product description. This was a great purchase especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fresh play-doh
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a Christmas sale and was a little sceptical as in how old it was for the price. It is wonderful! Soft, great colors, extra of most used colors. It has been a long time since I have found this fresh of play-doh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of colors!
customer_reviews.text: I know it says that there are 36 tubs of play-doh, but I guess I didn't have a good concept of quite how many that is, because 36 tubs is a LOT of play-doh. I've had this for months now, and I am still finding colors that my kiddos haven't even opened yet because there are so many colors to choose from! I love this set!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Entertainment for hours!
customer_reviews.text: Great entertainment to keep little hands busy. All the kids got into the play-doh at Christmas! These were great to have around, enough so everyone can have a couple colors to play with.
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee

customer_reviews.title: lot of uncommon colors.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great package for general playing. Doesn't have much of primary or secondary colors. It does have a lot of variety and colors we didn't currently have. There was about 7 that had duplicate colors so those went into play rotation first. Lot of uncommon colors than we normally have. We are very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: 241Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I wish the cans were the larger size, but I can't complain too much to get a 36-can pack of Play-Doh for just a few dollars more than the 24-can pack. It looks like we may have received a couple duplicate colors, but they could also just be very similar in color. None of the cans were cracked or missing lids. All of the Play-Doh was soft and pliable. The "frustration-free packaging" is a simple brown cardboard box. We have tried various recipes to make our own dough, but there is nothing quite like the original Play-Doh!
customer_reviews.author: ashlie

customer_reviews.title: Boring Color Assortment
customer_reviews.text: Colors were pink, orange, pink, yellow, light blue, pink, darker pink, purple, more pink, another orange, one brown, green, pink, purple, aqua, pink, orange... just not as fun as a pack of crayons. Needs a better assortment.
customer_reviews.author: David Maio Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect variety
customer_reviews.text: Perfect price for ALOT of doh!! We just bought another set today, my kid LOVES playdoh, but she’s also 2 years old, so let’s be realistic, most of the time it doesn’t make it back in the containers and ends up drying out. For this price though, you can’t beat it! So many different color options & the price is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Marcus berrelez

customer_reviews.title: Was a Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my niece who loves play doh, it is great. We were able to put some of them up and use for later such as a birthday present, or maybe if a color dried out. It honestly was a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Fallen Over Book Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great size and price!
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a good size can of play doh for my 3 year old kids. Just enough to have them mold, create blobs, hide toys inside, etc. Not such a big can it is more than they need and gets wasted and not too little to do anything with. My boys really like play-doh, but they also destroy a lot of it. So, the bulk pricing is nice. Great package for them!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Love this assortment of colors!
customer_reviews.text: This lot has an excellent assortment of colors and has provided hours of endless entertainment with several sets that we ran out of Play-Doh for! Awesome to have on hand to pull out when life gets boring!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie A Devlaeminck

customer_reviews.title: Surprise! Same old play doh
customer_reviews.text: We got these on sale for about $13 around Christmas, which is a great deal for 36 cans. These are the slightly smaller size cans, full size in most stores run $1-1.50 ea. Your kid (and you) won't notice unless they have another set right beside them. They came in a brown box without play doh packaging but they were all intact, closed and good to go. Some similar colors but otherwise great selection. Definitely worth buying if you go through a lot of play doh, or have a kid that likes to forget about it and leaves it out to dry
customer_reviews.author: Schnar

customer_reviews.title: Play doh for life!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was ridiculously excited to buy this for our kids! I think we have enough Play doh to last us for the rest of our lives now! Lots of colors, lots of options, and the perfect size! We love love love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False advertising!
customer_reviews.text: All duplicates, only 4 colors and two of them were so similar (light purple/pink) they could be counted as one color. The other two colors were teal and orange. You can make much with those. Waste of money and false advertising!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Radovic

customer_reviews.title: Play Doh stock pile
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 38 count package of play doh so I could give my granddaughter play doh "presents" through the rest of the year. The containers came packed in a nice box and had 6 different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Online Buyere

customer_reviews.title: More playdos please
customer_reviews.text: Even though it was one of least expensive presents for my niece, the 3 year old loves this one the most. Who doesn't like playdos. Till she is a grade schooler, she will be getting this one for every Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: NewBee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors and quality you expect from Play-Doh.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it Play-doh! I just couldn’t pass up the value. The colors are beautiful. The packaging was a little disappointing, as it was just the jars of Play-Doh running around in a brown card by box.
customer_reviews.author: E. Winstead

customer_reviews.title: Many colors
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for a clinic giving services to kids. They’re smaller than I expected but that’s ok. If they leave them open to dry out, it’s easier to replace. They’ve lasted a long time and the kids LOVE how many different colors there are.
customer_reviews.author: Holly J.

customer_reviews.title: We love and go through Play Doh at our house
customer_reviews.text: We love and go through Play Doh at our house! I actually bought this to give for my daughter's class Valentine's day gifts but ended up keeping it for ourselves. This Play Doh is so much softer than the stuff you buy at the store. It doesn't dry out as fast either. I actually will just grab a ball of it and play with in my hand like a stress ball. It is just that soft! The colors are neat too! Not the likely colors would be buy in the store. It is going to take us awhile to get through all of it but when we do I will never buy it at Wal Mart or Target again!
customer_reviews.author: mdauphin

customer_reviews.title: Duplicates
customer_reviews.text: I order this every Christmas for the past 4 years. This is the first year I have received SO MANY DUPLICATES. One color even came with 3! I opened them to make sure they were the same. I'm pretty disappointed, but not enough to bother exchanging.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: So much play-doh for a decent price! I bought these for my wife's baby shower for a game we played and everyone had a blast. The play-doh is good quality and such a huge variety of colors to choose from. We gave some to family with little ones and we saved some for our 2 year old daughter and she loves playing with it. Definitely recommend if you need lots of play-doh!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Ledezma

customer_reviews.title: Lots of playdough
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for Christmas for my son. He loved it. I didn't pay much attention when I ordered it that it was 3 lbs of playdough!! 3 months later and we still have containers we have yet to open.
customer_reviews.author: T.G

customer_reviews.title: It's playdoh
customer_reviews.text: Its cheap, and my kids love it. Buying in bulk is the way to go, its hella inexpensive. You know you're getting a quality product, and a mess in your kitcehn. We will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of play dough
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect set of Play-dough. It comes with a great variety of colors but be aware they are the smaller containers. We didn’t mind that they were the smaller containers because it came in a pack of 36.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves playdoh
customer_reviews.text: my kid LOVES playdoh. He also loves to leave it out. This big case is great cuz I canr stand reanimating old playdoh... makes my hands hurt so this giant box of colors is great.
customer_reviews.author: Zgriz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift set
customer_reviews.text: This gift set is amazing !! I purchased it for my kids for Christmas. It’s great ! The only complaint is now I have play doh coming out of my ears hahaha. Kidding aside it’s a fantastic product
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly 36 different colors, but pretty close - including some colors you didn't know you needed (exactly how long is the white play doh going to stay white?). I can imagine it would be a great set for a kid that liked to design and build out of play doh (it would be great for "bakery" or "ice cream shop"), but provides a lot of fun for my toddler as well - he loves choosing different colors. Small containers, but a good amount. Got it during a lightening deal, so we're quite pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Colors
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. If any colors doubled I couldnt care less and neither did my 3 yr old nephew. All the containers are not the regular size, they are a bit tinier, but I think thats perfect for this amount. I enjoyed opening the containers and looking at the colors as much as the 3 year old did.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal - be a kids hero
customer_reviews.text: I donated this to my daughter’s class. It was perfect and provided enough for all kids in the class. Definitely the best deal in terms of variety, individual can size and quantity.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelMichael

customer_reviews.title: Great texture, color selection, and value.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value pack of Play-Doh. I have bought more than 2 sets of these for my kids and the kids at church. I have tried value brands and even making my own dough, but this dough is superior. It's soft and easy to mold and doesn't stain clothes. Honestly, I don't know why people try to make their own. The dye comes off and gets all over and the texture always seems sticky no matter what. This dough is the way to go, and this pack is the best pack I have come across for color samples and value.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great set o’ dough!
customer_reviews.text: Super set for the money. Bulk does translate into savings. Lot of great colors. Daughter loves the set, and makes sculptures that she often lets dry solid so we need to re-supply. This is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Burgundy

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got these
customer_reviews.text: Bought this during the COVID-19 craziness. My kids are getting hours of fun out of this playdoh. Used it for a project on the layers of the earth and it’s been used pretty much daily since.
customer_reviews.author: SweetPotatoFries

customer_reviews.title: 3 yo grand daughter loves these
customer_reviews.text: There are so many colors, the kids can make good models of food, cars, faces and even poop😂. Our 3yo will play with this for over an hour at a time and that is the highest endorsement I can give any toy.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cottingham

customer_reviews.title: Gifts at kindergarten for holiday
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves play dough and she said she wanted to share with her friends so they can have fun too. We got some holiday cookie cutters and made goodie bags. Her school doesn’t allowed any snacks/food. So it made good little goodie bag.
customer_reviews.author: minji uyeshiro

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality play dough!!!
customer_reviews.text: Play dough came nicely packed in the box, non were damaged. Pretty good variety or colors out of 36 we got doubles of 11 colors and 14 of single color so overall we received 25 of different colors, some were really close in color but slightly different. Loved that it doesn’t stick to hands and really soft.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Economical buy!
customer_reviews.text: This play doh is fantastic. It is very soft and pliable, even a month later, and my children aren't great about placing the lids securely on the container when done. Makes being inside during the Covid-19 pandemic more bearable as they have become quite imaginative with this.
customer_reviews.author: csrtoni

customer_reviews.title: What Fun Colors!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Play-Doh? I bought it for Grandma, but there were 10 duplicate colors, so those the grandbabies can have! I don't let them play with mine because they mix the colors lol! I put them in our craft room. We will all have fun playing with these beautiful colors!!
customer_reviews.author: VickiA

customer_reviews.title: Lots of colors!!!
customer_reviews.text: All the play doh was perfectly new and not dried out at all. I think the colors were packed at random... we ended up with about 5 yellows, BUT still had a great selection. An amazing and creative gift for the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Descant Music and Art Studio

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my fifth grade classroom and put out half of them for my kids to use. After 4 months, most of that half are gross and dried up. I'm honestly impressed with how long they've lasted, so I bought a second set!
customer_reviews.author: Jen G

customer_reviews.title: Great for classrooms
customer_reviews.text: They come in a cardboard box so it's not super pretty per se. But we gifted these to our sons teacher for use in classroom manipulatives. Awesome pack with enough variety for a whole classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher and Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Came on time, product was in good condition, no damages.
customer_reviews.text: 36 small containers of more colors under the sun! Including black and white. great for teaching 2 yr olds how to become creative. Its still the same ole play doh that I used when I was a kid about 56 years ago. Now I am a famous model maker/sculptor known world wide thanks to play doh.
customer_reviews.author: covert work

customer_reviews.title: Fun for EVERYONE!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this....i mean Santa gifted this to my kids on Christmas this past year & of course it was a hitl, who doesn't like play-doh! I caught it on sale so for the price it came out to like 50 cent each container so not a bad deal plus the smell brings me back to my own childhood I feel like play-doh is one of those staple toys for every generation, it never gets played out except of course when it drys out but having 35cans of the stuff comes in handy!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Best playdoh ever!
customer_reviews.text: SO MUCH PLAYDOH!!! Perfect activity for when your stuck inside during the pandemic. And you can’t beat the quality! It’s a wonderful way for kids to use their creativity.
customer_reviews.author: KLD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome color selection. Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: These come in a plain cardboard box which was a surprise but 36 containers of pretty color playdoh for $25?! Can’t beat it. This was just for my kids so the packaging didn’t bother me in the slightest but wouldn’t be the prettiest gift. There aren’t a lot of lame colors like brown which, lets face it, they all turn into anyways after they’re played with. Would absolutely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I read the reviews and bought it.. it is the big size and many colors.. my toddler loves it but we had to buy more very often, now we have enough for a while at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Mislla

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this value pack to give out as gifts. It was a great value for what you receive. If you are looking for a variety of colors for one person, this is not for you. Many of the colors are very similar, but great for giveaways!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good for gift bags
customer_reviews.text: All the colours are super vibrant and the dough is very soft. I was worried with ordering this man it might come sightly old. But it all feels fresh and new.
customer_reviews.author: Bhan

product_meta.title: Play-Doh Modeling Compound 36-Pack Case of Colors, Non-Toxic, Assorted Colors, 3-Ounce Cans (Amazon Exclusive)
product_meta.description: This Mega 36-pack is full of Mega fun! These bounce Play-Doh cans come in 36 assorted colors For all of your creative needs. From birthday gifts and party favors, to kid party crafts and classroom activities, these cans are full of everyone's favorite non-toxic Play-Doh compound. This Play-Doh set is great for kids ages 2 and up who love to squish, mix, and make fun creations with Arts and crafts like modeling clay. It ships in simple recyclable packaging that's easy to open and frustration free. The Play-Doh cans and lids are also recyclable to help build a more sustainable world!
feature_bullets: Frustration free: Ships in easy to open, recyclable Frustration Free packaging
Over 6 pounds of Play Doh compound this Play Doh modeling compound 36 pack has 36 assorted colors in 3 Ounce cans for all your colorful creative needs, and there's plenty for kids to share
Mega pack of Mega Play Doh fun shape, squish, mix, and make it all. Great for lots of uses like classrooms, play dates, arts and crafts, party favors for kids, birthday gifts, or a Play Doh refill
Shape your imagination squishy, bright, non toxic Play Doh compound sparks imaginations For kids 2 and up who love arts and crafts like Modeling clay
Easy open, recyclable package SHIPS in simple recyclable packaging that's easy to open and frustration free, and the Play Doh cans and lids are also recyclable to help build a more sustainable world

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars5,358 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
